name: Euchre (J & F Publishing)
overview: Euchre or is a trick-taking card game commonly played worldwide, this version created by Lance C. Thomas was published in Loadstar #189 in 2000 and is a solitaire version. You are dealt five cards and the goal is to take at least three tricks. There are several variations, even one configuration where you set the computer to play itself in order to learn strategy.
